flawed_nl_solution:
Billy took some candies and got more from his father for a total of 6+8 = <<6+8=14>>14 candies
Caleb has a total of 11+11 = <<11+11=25>>25 candies
Their father gave out 8+11 = <<8+11=19>>19 candies from a pack of 36
He gave the rest which is 36-19 = <<36-19=17>>17 candies to Andy
Andy has a total of 9+17 = <<9+17=26>>26 candies
Andy has 26-25 = <<26-25=1>>1 more candies than Caleb

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
